inclusion.criterion: Refractory or relapsed myeloma, defined as one or more of the following:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treated with first-line therapy including at least 2 cycles of lenalidomide, bortezomib or thalidomide, and one or more of the following:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Less than partial response (PR) to first-line therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: High-risk cytogenetics, defined by deletion (del)(13q) by conventional cytogenetics, or by del(17p), t(4;14), t(14;16), t(14;20) or 1q+ by fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Relapse after a prior autologous stem cell transplant (ASCT)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine =< 1.8 mg/dL and/or estimated serum creatinine clearance >= 50 ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT) and/or serum glutamate pyruvate transaminase (SGPT) =< 3 x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin =< 2 x upper limit of normal, unless proven to be due to disease involvement
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Alkaline phosphatase =< 2 x upper limit of normal, unless proven to be due to disease involvement
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate pulmonary function with forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1), forced vital capacity (FVC) and diffusion capacity of the lung for carbon monoxide (DLCO) >= 50% of expected corrected for hemoglobin and/or volume
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate cardiac function with left ventricular ejection fraction >= 40%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having received radiation therapy to head and neck (excluding eyes), and internal organs of chest, abdomen or pelvis in the month prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has refractory myeloma with relapse after first-line therapy and autologous stem cell transplant. She meets several inclusion criteria but has not received radiation therapy in the past month.
